column1: Encouraging news! Thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed we have a second vaccine with proven effectiveness. If approved by the FDA we will be able to safely deliver #COVID19 vaccine doses to the American people as quickly and reliably as possible. https://t.co/1ftcECHqtO

Joined my colleague @RepTedDeutch this morning for a virtual town hall with @USGLC to discuss #COVID19 & the need to work together to ease the impact on our health economy and well-being. We cannot lose momentum in the fight against this deadly pandemic at home and abroad. https://t.co/DeGmjuS2ji

It’s the responsibility of the Speaker of the House to reach a bipartisan agreement on critical #COVID19 assistance. Yet Speaker Pelosi continues to play politics— proposing flawed legislation knowing it stands no chance of becoming law. https://t.co/sYHjyRb8uh
Praying for a complete and speedy recovery for @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS as well as all those affected by #COVID19. https://t.co/3s2npqfzkJ

The @USDA is now accepting applications to provide additional assistance for our farmers and ranchers whose operation has been directly affected by #COVID19. Applications will be accepted through December 11 2020. For more information visit https://t.co/QPDLVWA7jF. https://t.co/RUfRom2EqH

If we've learned anything from the #COVID19 pandemic it's that we can never be too prepared for any threat to our national security. We must use this pandemic to improve our preparedness for any future global public health emergency. Thank you @SenatorMenendez @SenatorCollins. https://t.co/lSrU6sRXdN

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram expired on Aug 8 2020; however $138B of the funds allocated by Congress in the #CARESAct went unspent. We must extend the #PPP and help save small businesses across our nation who continue to struggle financially due to #COVID19. https://t.co/naNQEDnlAj

The American people are incredibly generous. This week @USAID announced the donation of 37 ventilators to #Haiti as part of its global assistance to combat #COVID19 and save lives. I am proud of U.S. leadership in helping our neighbors and allies fight this deadly disease.

This is a significant development for #Floridians left unemployed as a result of #COVID19. I commend @POTUS for signing this executive order granting additional unemployment benefits to those in need and I thank @GovRonDeSantis for his great work in our state. https://t.co/0rOh0wNeMi

Yesterday I joined Michael Putney and @GlennaWPLG on This Week in South Florida where we discussed a wide range of issues including Phase 3 clinical trials for a COVID-19 vaccine absentee ballots vs. mail-in voting and a new #COVID19 relief package. https://t.co/sOGk9hn3q8

🌀 As #HurricaneIsaias approaches Florida this weekend it’s important that you and your family know your emergency plan which may have changed due to COVID-19. To view your evacuation zone click here: https://t.co/DGNKeqMBOM

Thanks to the diligence & dedication of our medical professionals our nation has moved at a historic pace in the development a #COVID19 vaccine and were hopeful and optimistic that this is another positive step towards normalcy.   For more info visit https://t.co/2GRNvDZ3ab. https://t.co/u3a10ig3nm

I joined @VP at the @univmiami to promote the beginning of Phase 3 of clinical trials for a coronavirus vaccine. This significant progress goes hand in hand with Operation Warp Speed which aims to deliver 300 million doses of a safe effective vaccine for #COVID19 by Jan 2021. https://t.co/nzuQXPK86c
Per the White House protocol I was tested for #COVID19 this morning and am negative. Thank you for your concern.

Great news! #FL25 will receive Emergency Solutions Grants (ESG) as part of the #CARESAct to help prevent mitigate & respond to #COVID19 among those who are homeless or receiving homeless assistance.  $2.7M @CityofHialeah $10.7M @MiamiDadeCounty  $2.5M @CollierPIO

Today I voted to condemn Communist China for its unconscionable human rights abuses against #Uyghurs and to hold it accountable. With #COVID19 Hong Kong IP theft bullying and oppression of Uyghurs more eyes have been opened to PRC’s malevolence.
.@IRSnews has set up a direct phone line where you can contact them regarding your #COVID19 economic impact payment. The phone number is 800-919-9835.  https://t.co/EZgttcCuiV

Hoy le envié una carta al Secretario de Estado @SecPompeo expresando mi profunda preocupación por los abusos contra los derechos humanos en #Nicaragua y la falta de transparencia del régimen de Ortega en los casos de COVID-19.  Lea más aquí:  https://t.co/IYHyTI46BO

Today I sent a letter to @SecPompeo expressing my profound concern regarding human rights abuses in #Nicaragua and the Ortega regime’s lack of transparency on #COVID19 cases.   Read more here: https://t.co/ZhjFQC3aLQ

(1/2) The 3rd stimulus package is supposed to provide critical help for the American people struggling due to #COVID19 yet Pelosi’s misguided bill includes funding for matters entirely unrelated to COVID-19 such as...

We’ve seen how many U.S. doctors nurses & other medical professionals have lost their jobs or were furloughed due to #COVID19 yet House Democratic Leadership proposed a bill that would import permanent foreign workers to medical field jobs... Unnecessary & irresponsible.
#Florida will receive $23.6M to help coastal and marine fisheries who have been affected by #COVID19. https://t.co/oWPKipwvHi

Hoy sostuve un buen intercambio de información y opiniones con líderes de la comunidad #hispana sobre la respuesta del gobierno federal al #COVID19. Un diálogo productivo que incluyó sus preocupaciones y los desafíos que enfrentan.

.@Walmart is working with @QuestDX as well as state and local officials in #FL25 & will be opening a drive-thru COVID-19 testing site at the Walmart on 9300 Nw 77th Ave in Hialeah starting tomorrow! https://t.co/qaokY3zeg0

.@HUDgov has awarded #Florida $63 million from the Community Development Block Grant program (CDBG) as part of the #CARESAct. This funding can be used to advance public health address #COVID19 needs and improve housing & economic issues.

Taiwan’s exemplary response to #COVID19 has been marked by transparency & deftness in striking contrast to Communist China’s deception & failures. The US & world would benefit from including #Taiwan in international organizations diplomacy & multilateral decision-making. https://t.co/DmnbTJXwXr

Yesterday my wife Tia and I visited @my1blood where I donated my plasma and she donated blood to help those with critical health conditions. I strongly encourage people who have recovered from COVID-19 to become a plasma donor— someone’s life could depend on it. https://t.co/ZSxmodjkeR

Florida will receive an additional $30.3 million from this #CARESAct funding which can be used to improve testing capacity contact tracing and the overall containment of #COVID19. https://t.co/utBcgf0L99

A constituent shared this moving video of the @cityofhialeah Fire Dept showing their gratitude to healthcare workers on the frontlines of the #COVID19 pandemic. We thank all the men and women risking it all to ensure our safety & thank you to @HialeahFD for this kind gesture. https://t.co/IuDpaFegcJ
Thank you @realDonaldTrump for the kind call asking about my #COVID19 recovery. I’m grateful for your leadership and our prayers are with you.

.@realDonaldTrump is right to suspend funding to @WHO while we assess how it became a mouthpiece for Communist China’s misinformation on Wuhan #Coronavirus. When lives depended on accurate info #WHO failed spectacularly.

Today my colleagues @RepRooney @RepDMP and I condemned the #Cuban regime for its exploitation of the #COVID19 pandemic for political gain their continued trafficking of Cuban medical professionals and the spreading of disinformation abroad.  Read more here⬇️ https://t.co/SYepBVCOjc

Included in the #CARESAct is $100B in relief funds for hospitals & other healthcare providers on the front lines of the #COVID19 response. HHS recently released $30B and of this amount #Florida will be receiving $2.2B––  that's the second-highest allocation after CA! https://t.co/xx5eCI53S8

.@tide has launched "Tide Cleaners Loads of Hope" which offers free laundry & dry cleaning services for those with an increased risk of exposure to #COVID19.   Find more info at https://t.co/fxwERGpjAu
Here's an informative article on the #COVID19 text and phone scams that are designed to trick you:  https://t.co/Aolhe46vzy

If you or someone you know has been a victim of an IRS-related coronavirus scam and for tips on what red flags to look for in potential scams visit the Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration website:  https://t.co/RFc2j6zfxy

Thank you @Visa  for pledging to secure 20000 employees worldwide including 775 in your Miami office during the #COVID19 pandemic. Congress will continue doing all we can to ensure the American people have the necessary resources to recover from this as quickly as possible.
Click to read about my personal experience experience with #COVID19. https://t.co/CenVR6NFdC

Today after being deemed #COVID19 free by my doctor I was able to reunite with my family in Miami. Though still a bit weak I feel well & I applied to participate in the @RedCross plasma donation to help those with serious or immediately life-threatening COVID-19 infections.

Today I spoke with @SecArmy to discuss the efforts of the men and women of @USArmy and @USNationalGuard to combat #COVID19 including vital medical research to find a vaccine. Thank you for your heroic service during this critical time.
¿Se pregunta cuánto recibirá del IRS en su cheque de #coronavirus?   Use esta calculadora para averiguar: https://t.co/blQ9qQc5Ee
Wondering how much you'll receive from the IRS in your #coronavirus check? Use this calculator to find out:  https://t.co/blQ9qQc5Ee
Thank you @GlennaWPLG for putting together one of the most informative shows dealing with #COVID19. A tough journalist and a true professional.   https://t.co/Hne3KpN6mv
A huge thank you to @BryanAvilaFL & his colleagues in the @USNationalGuard for their service to our country and their efforts to mitigate the spread of #COVID19. https://t.co/5xfsdxoXml

Tomorrow the House will vote on the #CARESAct which provides immediate emergency relief for the American people as we continue to combat #COVID19.   I fully support this legislation & I’m proud of the unprecedented measures our nation has taken during this time of uncertainty.
.@POTUS aprobó una declaración de desastre mayor para el estado de #Florida provocando la liberación de fondos para ayudar al pueblo y las comunidades estadounidenses a recuperarse de #COVID19.
.@POTUS has approved a Major Disaster Declaration for the State of #Florida prompting the release of Federal funds to help the American people and communities recover from #COVID19.
.@HHSGov awarded $100 million to health centers across our nation with funding provided by the first Coronavirus supplemental package which I voted for. https://t.co/eZcSkPtGt0
Here's a list of the COVID-19 drive-thru testing centers in #SouthFlorida. https://t.co/j5Ek3TDg4c

Gracias @realDonaldTrump por contactarme para saber cómo he seguido y por todo lo que está haciendo por nuestra nación. Mientras sigo luchando contra #COVID19 me siento fuerte y espero una recuperación completa.
Thank you @realDonaldTrump for reaching out to check up on me and for all you're doing for our nation. While I am still fighting #COVID19 I feel strong and look forward to a full recovery

The U.S. Small Business Administration is also offering low-interest federal disaster loans for small businesses and private non-profit organizations suffering substantial economic injury as a result of #COVID19.   https://t.co/0jNQSwziMq https://t.co/QjsQwjpR7f

#Florida small businesses impacted by #COVID19 may be eligible for short-term interest-free loans through the Florida Small Business Emergency Bridge Loan program.   APPLY HERE: https://t.co/TAikfXeney
The total number of #COVID19 cases in #Florida has reached 520.   Find more case-by-case info here: https://t.co/arXBPTe39E
If your employment has been negatively impacted by #COVID19 you may be eligible to receive Reemployment Assistance from @FLDEO. https://t.co/zivpgyOmLR

Quiero agradecerle a tantos amigos y colegas sus gestos de solidaridad y preocupación por mi salud. Continúo mi recuperación de #COVID2019. Dicho esto continúo reiterando la gravedad de esta pandemia e insto a todos que se queden en casa y sigan las recomendaciones de @CDCgov.

I'd like to thank all of my friends and colleagues for their well-wishes as I recover from #COVID2019. With that being said I continue to reiterate the seriousness of this pandemic and urge you to stay home and follow the @CDCgov's recommendations.
This is an important step to ensure our nation is taken care of during this time of uncertainty. #COVID2019 https://t.co/YeN2Elxozz

The number of #Florida #COVID19 cases has spiked to 314 in total.   80 in Broward and & 76 in Miami-Dade. Please continue to take precautions and practice social distancing. We must continue to mitigate the spread of this virus.
Informative user-friendly @HealthyFla page which contains important resources regarding #COVID19 in Florida. https://t.co/EqN5AgbpyF
Here’s what small businesses should know about the recent legislation passed by the House and other relevant resources available in response to #COVID19. https://t.co/2Qp0PCN26U
According to @HealthyFla as of 10 a.m. today there are 192 total #COVID19 cases in Florida. Monitor this information on their COVID-19 dashboard which is updated twice daily. https://t.co/n3SVkfApc5
Here are @POTUS' guidelines to slow the spread of #COVID2019 in the United States. https://t.co/zIm1tQBhgl

Tonight I proudly voted for the Families First Coronavirus Response Act a bill that will provide much-needed additional resources to expand our testing capabilities and accessibility and it will also ensure that American families are prepared to address this pandemic. #COVID19

Tonight I proudly voted for the Families First Coronavirus Response Act a bill that will provide much-needed additional resources to expand our testing capabilities and accessibility and it will also ensure that American families are prepared to address this pandemic. #COVID19

I have been and will continue to be in frequent contact with local state & federal officials regarding preparedness and protocol for #COVID19 & will continue to maintain an open line of communication with both my constituents and those on the frontline of this issue.
Here are some helpful tips for your daily routine. It's important that we take all the preventative measures to prevent and contain #COVID2019. https://t.co/CxSOIez4pt

.@CDCgov anunció que otorgará más de $560M a jurisdicciones estatales y locales en respuesta a #COVID19. #Florida recibirá más de $27M. Como apropiador estoy orgulloso de haber ayudado a asegurar estos fondos para abordar la creciente amenaza del coronavirus en nuestra nación.

The @CDCgov announced it will be awarding over $560M to state & local jurisdictions in response to #COVID19. #Florida will receive just over $27 million. As an appropriator I’m proud to have helped secure these vital funds to address the growing coronavirus threat in our nation.

While the US & the Federal government have been preparing for public health challenges such as #COVID19 it’s crucial that Americans continue to take preventative measures to keep themselves safe. Visit my website for the latest updates & useful resources. https://t.co/qoyvXIXMGe

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for signing the #coronavirus supplemental! This funding facilitates expedited vaccine development assists local and state health departments & provides the necessary resources to purchase essential equipment and supplies. https://t.co/nxHBzHWXNB

I joined my #FL delegation colleagues in asking the Trump Admin to prioritize federal resources to prevent & respond to outbreaks of #COVID19 in states like #Florida with identified coronavirus cases a substantial senior population & high levels of foreign & domestic tourism. https://t.co/bQzHKffRtt

As an appropriator I’m proud we were able to pass an $8.3 billion emergency supplemental package to help combat #coronavirus. We must ensure that our nation is prepared to face this pandemic and that we continue doing all we can to prevent it from further spreading. https://t.co/4oII7yKlrO

For FY20 @TomColeOK0 & I secured $85M for the Infectious Disease Rapid Response Reserve Fund a top priority of mine. This serves as emergency money to combat dangerous outbreaks. These funds are available & ready to be used should it be necessary to combat the #Coronavirus.
